title: OCE community is the most toxic community.
body:
"GG EZ" by the feeding enemy support every game every time they get carried to a win, after a 50 minute+ game.
"SO SALTY" after every  time someone responds to their trolling.

No wonder Lol OCE as an "e-sport" is dead. Its community rivals that of CoD.

Inb4 "GG EZ SO SALTY".

Bring on Overwatch.
